name: CommandWizard
0:
”Alexa, ask Command Wizard about the curl command”
”Alexa, ask Command Wizard how I can combine two files”
”Alexa, ask Command Wizard to lookup options for cut”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: command wizard
Developer Terms of Use
des: Command Wizard is a virtual assistant to help you lookup information related to Linux commands. Its like a voice-enabled man page. Not sure what the grep command does, just ask. Want to know the common options for the cut command, you can ask that too! You can also ask for a tip or to learn about a new command.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
